name: Overstep
summary:
What is Overstep? 
Action, destruction and mayhem in a bottle, Overstep is a fast paced shooter which takes you from fight to fight in seconds. 
Our combat is fluid and puts you in direct control, craft and sell your weapons and armor, or take them from others as the spoils of war! 
Get rewarded for your efforts and be the star of Overstep. The prestige system highlights you for every action you take. 
High intensity stunts are not your thing? Overstep has corporations that reward different playstyles whatever your preference. 

Game features 
- First Person Shooter 
- Free to Play (definitely not pay to win) 
- Old-school fast pace 
- High mobility with combos and stunts 
- Highly customisable items 
- Item Marketplace 
- Career system 
- And so much more
storyline:
Enter Overstep, a tournament broadcast throughout the galaxy. It exploded from an underground gambling league, into a way for the corporations to show they were superior. Today these corporations are on the verge of war. Will the next season of Overstep lead to all out war or greater profits? 
Join Overstep’s insane high speed diverse combat, show off your favorite play style and get sponsored by a corporation!
